name: Emerald Heist
description:
For Weekly Game Jam - Week 47 "Thief!"

- Break into the building.

- Avoid all security cameras.

-Bypass all doors by hacking computers.

- Steal the Emerald.

- Escape the building alive and rendezvous with the getaway helicopter!

This is my first time having controller support in a game. I only had an Xbox 360 controller to test it with so results may vary.
